duties_responsibilities.duty: Identify patient's alterations in health and assess human response to health problems.
Implement nursing interventions based on theoretical concepts from nursing and other arts and sciences.
Supervise/direct care provided by licensed practical nurses and unlicensed assistive personnel.
Assign/delegate care to other qualified members of the health care team and coordinate care between other professional disciplines.

Provide and coordinate care to achieve the organization's mission of excellent patient care and nursing's vision of setting a new standard of excellence in autonomous and accountable nursing practice.

education_certification.credential: BSN and professional nursing board certification preferred at time of hire.
Current RN license in the state of Florida.
